Class EqualityUtils

extends Object
    This utility class provides methods to handle equality in conjunctive queries.

    Cl√©ment Sipieter (INRIA) <clement@6pi.fr>

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<ConjunctiveQuery,Substitution> processEquality(ConjunctiveQuery q)
      This method produces a conjunctive query based on the specified one where equality atoms are removed and affected variables are replaced or merged.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • processEquality

        public static org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<ConjunctiveQuery,Substitution> processEquality(ConjunctiveQuery q)
        This method produces a conjunctive query based on the specified one where equality atoms are removed and affected variables are replaced or merged. It returns the new query and a substitution which allow to rebuild answers to the original query based on answers to the returned one by composition of each answer with the returned substitution.
        Parameters:
        q - a conjunctive query
        Returns:
        a pair composed of the computed conjunctive query and the substitution which allow to rebuild answers.
